definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[חפח]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. s.afah.a II. make wide, broad; s,afiyh.ah;un anything broad (stone, plank, sheathing, plating), Syr. s.piyh.to0 plating; also Eth saf:h.a: spread out, extend; Sab. (Lih.) [[החפחת]], [[אחפחת]] platform, DHM:Epigr. Denkm. 84. 86; but (transp.) Ar. s.ah.fah;un, wide bowl, cf. Frä:63).
